Package src.Controller.Camp.Student

Class StudentCampController

java.lang.Object
src.Controller.Camp.CampController
src.Controller.Camp.Student.StudentCampController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IStudentCampController
public class StudentCampController extends CampController implements IStudentCampController
Represents a controller for managing student interactions with camps. This class extends CampController and implements IStudentCampController.

  • Constructor Details

    • StudentCampController

      public StudentCampController(CampDataHandler campdatahandler)

  • Method Details

    • getCamp

      public List<Camp> getCamp(Student s)
      Retrieves a list of camps available for a given student based on the student's faculty. Only camps that are visible, have slots available, and match the student's faculty are included.
      Specified by:
      getCamp in interface IStudentCampController
      Parameters:
      s - The student for whom to retrieve available camps.
      Returns:
      A list of Camp objects representing the available camps for the student.

    • viewCamp

      public void viewCamp(Student s, String filter, String option)
      Displays available camps for a student with the option to filter the camps by location, camp name, or date. The camps are displayed in a table format with detailed information.
      Specified by:
      viewCamp in interface IStudentCampController
      Parameters:
      s - The student for whom the camps are to be displayed.
      filter - The filter criterion ("Location", "Camp Name", "Date", or other).
      option - The specific filter option (e.g., location name, camp name, date range).

    • registerSlot

      public void registerSlot(Student s, Camp c, boolean committeeChoice)
      Registers a student for a camp and optionally as a camp committee member. Checks various conditions like registration deadlines, available slots, and faculty restrictions. Also ensures no date clashes with other registered camps.
      Specified by:
      registerSlot in interface IStudentCampController
      Parameters:
      s - The student registering for the camp.
      c - The camp for which the student is registering.
      committeeChoice - Boolean flag indicating if the student also wants to join the camp committee.

    • withdrawCamp

      public void withdrawCamp(Student s, Camp c)
      Allows a student to withdraw from a registered camp. Ensures the student is currently registered for the camp and not a committee member of the camp.
      Specified by:
      withdrawCamp in interface IStudentCampController
      Parameters:
      s - The student who wishes to withdraw from the camp.
      c - The camp from which the student wishes to withdraw.

    • viewRegisteredCamps

      public List<Camp> viewRegisteredCamps(Student s)
      Displays a list of camps that a student has registered for. Shows the camp name and the student's role (attendee or committee member) in a table format.
      Specified by:
      viewRegisteredCamps in interface IStudentCampController
      Parameters:
      s - The student whose registered camps are to be displayed.
      Returns:
      A list of Camp objects representing the camps the student is registered for.
